item.title: New sanctions target Russian web hosting service over suspected ransomware operations
item.description: The United States, Britain and Australia have announced sanctions against a Russia-based web hosting service for allegedly running ransomware operatio...

item.title: Ford recalls more than 200,000 Bronco and Bronco Sports for instrument panel failure
item.description: Ford Motor Co. is recalling more than 200,000 Bronco and Bronco Sport vehicles because an instrument panel can fail, increasing the risk of a crash

item.title: Guterres and Lula to push negotiators at COP30 as deadline looms
item.description: United Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres and Brazil's President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva are jumping into the United Nations climate talks a...

item.title: Profit slide at Target hints at meager holiday season for the retailer
item.description: Target’s third-quarter profit tumbled as the retailer struggles to lure shoppers that are being pressed by stubbornly high inflation

item.title: Belgian farmer sues French energy giant for damage caused by climate change
item.description: A Belgian farmer is taking TotalEnergies to court, arguing the company should pay for climate change damage
